name: Mike Croutcher
text: Although a bit expensive, the Margarita Pizza had crazy fresh toppings. It was very good.

name: Kate Brennan
text: Imagine my Surprise to discover I can order from here from 5 Cities on Door Dash! ‚Ä¶More

name: Paul Baker
text: Great place to get pizza and italian dishes. Really nice people, fast service, and delicious food.

name: kenton maddox
text: I got a pizza combo #1 for lunch. The pizza was amazing. It was crunchy and packed with toppings. I couldn't have been happier with it. The pasta salad was a bit generic in taste. Though its not that it was bad, perhaps overshadowed by how great the pizza was.

name: Jacques Drazsnzak
text: Pizza Republic has a nice outdoor deck that is wonderful to sit in almost a year round considering the temperate climate of San Luis Obispo. The pizza is consistently good. The salads are also quite good but make sure to tell them how much ‚Ä¶More

name: Thomas Cook
text: Pizza Republic is conveniently located near the major intersection of Broad and Tank Farm. Close to the ever expanding SLO airport and multiple growing businesses. They consistently prepared and provide fresh items with a smile. Portion ‚Ä¶More

name: Mike Pereira
text: Pizza Republic never disappoints and they took it to the next level this evening.  I just had one of the best  slices I‚Äôve ever had. They made me a custom slice of BBQ sauce, cheddar cheese, bacon and red onions and it is  terrific. You can‚Äôt go wrong with Pizza Republic!!

name: Michele Rempel
text: Ordered some sandwiches, pizza and a salad to go for a social distancing lunch. Everything was delicious, fresh and generous. Thank you.

name: Kari Landry
text: This is a special weekly lunch spot for my daughter and myself. They have a few vegan options and are willing to accommodate slight changes in the menu. Very friendly staff and super efficient.

name: KB The craft beer brotha
text: The üçï was üî•!  The crust was so delicious!!

name: E Campbell
text:
Way over priced.   Salads are pre made.   Not fresh.
Pizzas sits there all day too.
It good if you order a whole pizza different from what they already made. ‚Ä¶More

name: Greg Mason
text: Great place to grab a good sandwich or a slice of really good pizza. Prices are competitive with the area. Very fast paced even at lunch time. I'm always in and out quickly without taking too much of my lunch break. Employees are very nice and understanding.

name: Kimberly
text: Yummy pizza with the most delicious crust I've ever had.  And lots of great salad sides.  you can order pizza by the slice and they have lots of different options.  The kids love it too.

name: George Londard
text: The place serves big portions and for affordable rates. super friendly employees. Keep up the good work.

name: Judith Graham
text: Today I had hoped to have a diet cherry anything with my lunch, only to find every selection I press to say "unavailable"  I have to say I don't appreciate having my choices limited to ice tea and lemonade in the sugar free drink ‚Ä¶More

name: Scott Hammond State Farm Insurance
text: Amazing pizza and fresh ingredients. One of the best pies I‚Äôve had in a long time! Their salads are fresh in their dressings are homemade. Five stars all the way around. Don‚Äôt miss this when you‚Äôre in San Luis Obispo! ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan Jorgenson
text: Wow,  $16.25 for 3 pieces and a drink. Won't be back they said that was with discount. It's good but no way is pizza that experience. Makes how good it tastes bad.

name: Richard Flores
text: Delicious I liked the spaghettis and added sausage yum

name: Pat Dempsey
text: Great spaghetti and meatballs! Excellent value. Locally owned and on premises.

name: Melissa Seidner
text: Definately worth trying.   I am not sure what previous reviewer was complaining about "amazon" employee being rude.  Probably has napoleon syndrome as the staff is always so friendly.

name: Paul Murray
text: Their pizza was good, service was quick, the pizzas were a little pricey, but the cook and cashier were friendly and funny, the beer selection was good and cold and I had my pizza in less than 15 minutes. They didn't skimp on toppings or cheese. I wish I would have gotten thinner crust, but I didn't ask, my Bad!!

name: Michael Lanier
text: Good food, would eat again

name: Joseph Hinckley
text: My fiance and I went in for a bite to eat I had the eggplant Parmesan as a sandwich the bread was fantastic and the quality of the cheese was great I used to work at Giuseppe's in Pismo so I've had quite a bit of very good authentic Italian ‚Ä¶More

name: Aaron Taylor
text: Pizza was ok and the special right prices. I got it with Mac and Cheese which was a little cold and clumpy. Not thier usual creamy Mac. However if you get with a salad it's the right meal, right priced. Staff was friendly and helpful and service was quick. Perfect for a busy lunch schedule.

name: Lisa Silveira
text: Delicious, high quality Italian fare‚ô•Ô∏èWe had pesto pasta salad and a perfect Margherita pizza!   Great customer service and thankful staff!  High quality Italian products make all the difference!  A wonderful place to have Italian foodüíö

text: Excellent food. Love the owner. Very nice! All menu items are fantastic!

name: Lisa Granada
text: So many fantastic meals to choose from. Their marinara sauce is delicious. My favorite so far. You can't go wrong eating here. It's more than just pizza.

name: Darryl Scheck
text: Awesome pizza and pasta place. I have taken my kids here during soccer tournaments across the street and never been disappointed. Prices are reasonable and the kids have loved it. Thank you!

name: Mayy may
text: Stopped by on the way and I was not disappointed. Clean

text: Good margaritas (the pizza kind) and the best Mac and Cheese around

name: Seth Howard
text: Good food, fast service, friendly staff.

name: Jonathan reynolds
text: The best "pizza by the slice" experience in SLO county. There are two other pizza places in SLO that sell it by the slice, and it was obvious upon my first bite that Pizza Republic is the best. In addition to the incredible taste, the ‚Ä¶More

name: Chief
text: My lunchtime spot! Pizza and pastas are super good?

name: Colleen Oberg
text: They are always very helpful and have great customer service. We go with our toddler and they are so sweet to our daughter and ready to help us in anyway we need. The food is yummy and the service is great!!!!!!

name: Jay Sears
text: Hot damm I love this place.  Anytime I am expecting a super busy day, I look forward to calling in and order and not having to worry about any complaints from the kids about dinner.  The pizza is amazing, the salads and dressings are fresh, ‚Ä¶More

text: Food and customer service were excellent.  The staff is very personable.

name: Casey Helmick
text: I'm a big fan of Pizza Republic. The food is really good. I usually get the Vegetali sandwich but everything there is delicious.

name: Daniel Jansen
text: Friendly and helpful service, but the food was just so-so.   The best entree we had was the margherita pizza.  The grilled cheese panini had too much cheese and the kids weren't fond of the pesto on it, although they did like the bread.  Overall the best food offering are the salads, but they came with too much dressing.

name: Shasta Dixon
text: Excellent place for food and customer service. Doesn't get any better!

name: Taylor Morgan
text: Killer spot for lunch during the workday. They do awesome slices of square pie that are killer for a quick lunch.

name: Josh Reed
text: Great Pizza Great Employees!  They have some great lunch specials and some amazing pizza! I cant stress enough the level of customer satisfaction the manager strives for there. Great place to go to.

name: Keen I.
text: Pretty good pies, disappointing pasta

name: Robert Williams
text: The food selection here is excellent for a small restaurant menu large selection of pizzas calzones sandwiches salads all very fresh there's outside seating an indoor seating it looks like for groups up to 6 or 8

name: J Lynch

text: Pretty good Italian food.  Pizza, panninis and pasta.  Not expensive, hole in the wall-ish.  Clean, and it had friendly staff.

unpretentious, it's what pizza needs to be. simple.

name: Suzan Vaughn
